fresh flatleaf parsley leaf, to garnish

steps: Place the halibut slices in the centre of a plate and pour over the lemon and lime juice. Season well with salt and freshly ground black pepper, then leave to 'cure' for 15-20 minutes.
To serve, garnish the plate with lime wedges and the fresh parsley leaf.
title: Halibut ceviche
